title: Digiverb Lo-Fi Reverb 1U (Used)
description:
Digiverb is a lo-fi reverb effect unit that uses an Accutronic digital reverb “tank” module. The sound is somewhere between a virtual spring reverb and a dense multi tap delay with a musical and interesting effect.

Use the Digiverb as a simple and fun way to add extra dimension to your patches!

This used unit is in great condition with only minor rack rash.
